name: The AfterMoth
description:
Try to control a randomly flying moth by guiding it with candles to the exit, but don't let it get too close to the flames!

Story:

It was a warm summer evening. The doors to the house were all open.

The people bustled about in a cacophony of talking and laughter, and bright lights filled the room.

It was the perfect storm to distract the moth flying by.

The small creature wandered deep into the house, chasing bright light after bright light.

But soon, the lights turned off, the doors closed, the people went to bed, and the moth was all alone, in the dark.

The silly moth cannot be told where to go. To save the moth, it must be carefully guided out...
